concept.title: Example of an MDITA map
concept.shortdesc: An MDITA map is authored in Markdown. The following example uses MDITA core-profile code to produce a map with a title, and an unordered list (itself containing a nested, unordered list) of titles for topics and their associated file names.

conbody.codeblock:
# Remote Lighting Network
- [Introduction](introduction.md) - [Alternative lighting setups](alternatives.md) - [Low power installation](low-power.md) - [High power installation](high-power.md)
